snippet: A turtle pond installed by the popular children’s book author Jan Brett has apparently attracted at least one resident, not to mention a giant bullfrog.
abstract: Children's-book author and illustrator Jan Brett describes how her latest book Mossy, which explores the life of an Eastern box turtle, inspired her to install a turtle pond in her Massachusetts home.
lead_paragraph: A turtle pond installed by the popular children’s book author Jan Brett has apparently attracted at least one resident, not to mention a giant bullfrog.

headline.seo: Even Turtles Need a Place to Call Home: A Conversation With the Author Jan Brett — Q&A
headline.main: Even Turtles Need a Nice Place to Call Home
headline.print_headline: Even Turtles Need a Nice Place to Call Home
